-  kAudioUnitScope_Global 

Global Variable# kAudioUnitScope_Global

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOS

```
var kAudioUnitScope_Global: AudioUnitScope { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioUnitScope_Global#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioUnitScope_Global#Constants)

[`var kAudioUnitScope_Group: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_group)In macOS, a context specific to the control scope of audio unit parameters.[`var kAudioUnitScope_Input: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_input)The context for audio data coming into an audio unit.[`var kAudioUnitScope_Layer: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_layer)[`var kAudioUnitScope_LayerItem: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_layeritem)[`var kAudioUnitScope_Note: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_note)In macOS, a scope for changes to an individual musical note. The element identifier used with this scope is the unique note identifier returned from a started note (see the `MusicDeviceStartNote` function in `AudioUnit/MusicDevice.h`).[`var kAudioUnitScope_Output: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_output)The context for audio data leaving an audio unit.[`var kAudioUnitScope_Part: AudioUnitScope`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitscope_part)
